channel.title: Gnupg on maxking's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gnupg on maxking's blog

item.title: GNUPG and python
item.description:
So this post talks about what gpg is, what are the various problems that can be solved using gpg and about python-gnupg library which can be used to sign a message or file using python

For now python-gnupg allows detached signatures from file type objects, but what if we want to verify some text with a detached signature in the form on string in out application? StringIO module has been of some help but I am up researching how to use it better. Once I am done with it I will resume to this post.
